mapper.insert: insert into oa_sys.filename(uid, ReleaseUid, TableUid, FileName, oldFileName, create_time) values (#{uid}, #{ReleaseUid}, #{TableUid}, #{FileName}, #{oldFileName}, #{create_time})
mapper.select: select uid, oldFileName, FileName from oa_sys.filename where ReleaseUid = #{ReleaseUid} and TableUid = #{TableUid} and RowUid is null and status = 0 order by create_time desc
